DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy use pre-dive checklist prevent incidence dive mishap recreational diver .
DOC.brief_title: Common Recreational Diving Practices : A Randomized Control Trial Using Pre-Dive Checklist
DOC.criteria: Over 18 year age Having valid Diver Certification Deemed fit Dive operator dive day participation Planning dive day participation Have basic knowledge English Anyone meeting inclusion criteria A diver answer outcome questionnaire later exclude
